description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED CONVERSION OF REAR ROOF SPACE  AND INSTALLATION OF 3 X ROOFLIGHTS TO THE FRONT ELEVATION. INSTALATION OF BI-FOLDING DOORS TO GROUND FLOOR REAR ELEVATION.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations, consisting of the replacement of the glazed door and window in the ground floor rear elevation with a three pane bi-fold door, would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class A of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class A. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations, consisting of the rear roof dormer window, would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations, consisting of the three rooflights in the front roof slope, would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.
